synopsis.text: Lucky Man, the cosmos' most fortunate superhero, bestows his powers upon the unluckiest boy on Earth, Yoichi Tsuitenai, in this laugh-out-loud gag comedy series. When Yoichi's luck runs out in the most catastrophic way possible—being crushed by an alien spaceship—Lucky Man fuses with him, transforming Yoichi into the universe's luckiest superhero. As Luckyman, Yoichi must now protect Earth from the relentless onslaught of aliens and other enemies seeking to conquer the planet. Alongside a growing roster of fellow heroes, Yoichi's adventures promise a thrilling and hilarious ride as he navigates his newfound powers and the challenges that come with them.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
